physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Height normal for age; proximal myopathy confirmed by electromyography and muscle biopsy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in myopathy took about 7 years to resolve.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Normal height for age; proximal myopathy; signs of a rachitic rosary and bowing of the tibiae.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Myopathy resolved after 8 months; normal growth rate continued.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No phenotypic features of XLH; clinical examination unremarkable.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressively developed joint pains; serum phosphate remained low.
